verses.verse: כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יַכְרִ֞ית <S%H3772><s%> hath cut off יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> When the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> the nations אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> whose יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לְךָ֖ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצָ֑ם <S%H776><s%> whose land וִֽירִשְׁתָּ֕ם <S%H3423><s%> thee and thou succeedest וְיָשַׁבְתָּ֥ <S%H3427><s%> them and dwellest בְעָרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5892><s%> in their cities וּבְבָתֵּיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1004><s%> and in their houses

שָׁל֥וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> three עָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> cities תַּבְדִּ֣יל <S%H914><s%> Thou shalt separate לָ֑ךְ בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> for thee in the midst אַרְצְךָ֔ <S%H776><s%> of thy land אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לְךָ֖ לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> thee to possess

תָּכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> Thou shalt prepare לְךָ֮ הַדֶּרֶךְ֒ <S%H1870><s%> thee a way וְשִׁלַּשְׁתָּ֙ <S%H8027><s%> into three parts אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> and divide the coasts אַרְצְךָ֔ <S%H776><s%> of thy land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יַנְחִֽילְךָ֖ <S%H5157><s%> giveth thee to inherit יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְהָיָ֕ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָנ֥וּס <S%H5127><s%> may flee שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any רֹצֵֽחַ׃ <S%H7523><s%> that every slayer

וְזֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> now this דְּבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> And this [is] the case הָרֹצֵ֔חַ <S%H7523><s%> of the slayer אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יָנ֥וּס <S%H5127><s%> which shall flee שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there וָחָ֑י <S%H2425><s%> thither that he may live אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> when יַכֶּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> Whoso killeth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7453><s%> his neighbour בִּבְלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> corruption דַ֔עַת <S%H1847><s%> cunning וְה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not שֹׂנֵ֥א <S%H8130><s%> whom he hated ל֖וֹ מִתְּמֹ֥ל <S%H8543><s%> not in time שִׁלְשֹֽׁם׃ <S%H8032><s%> past

וַאֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> when יָבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> As when a man goeth אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with רֵעֵ֥הוּ <S%H7453><s%> with his neighbour בַיַּעַר֮ <S%H3293><s%> into the wood לַחְטֹ֣ב <S%H2404><s%> to hew עֵצִים֒ <S%H6086><s%> wood וְנִדְּחָ֨ה <S%H5080><s%> fetcheth a stroke יָד֤וֹ <S%H3027><s%> and his hand בַגַּרְזֶן֙ <S%H1631><s%> with the axe לִכְרֹ֣ת <S%H3772><s%> to cut down הָעֵ֔ץ <S%H6086><s%> the tree וְנָשַׁ֤ל <S%H5394><s%> slippeth הַבַּרְזֶל֙ <S%H1270><s%> and the head מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָעֵ֔ץ <S%H6086><s%> from the helve וּמָצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> and lighteth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֵעֵ֖הוּ <S%H7453><s%> upon his neighbour וָמֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> that he die ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יָנ֛וּס <S%H5127><s%> he shall flee אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַחַ֥ת <S%H259><s%> unto one הֶעָרִים־ <S%H5892><s%> of those cities הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these וָחָֽי׃ <S%H2425><s%> and live

פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> otherwise יִרְדֹּף֩ <S%H7291><s%> pursue גֹּאֵ֨ל <S%H1350><s%> Lest the avenger הַדָּ֜ם <S%H1818><s%> of the blood אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after that הָרֹצֵ֗חַ <S%H7523><s%> the manslayer כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> while יֵחַם֮ <S%H3179><s%> is hot לְבָבוֹ֒ <S%H3824><s%> his heart וְהִשִּׂיג֛וֹ <S%H5381><s%> and overtake כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> inasmuch as יִרְבֶּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> is long הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> him because the way וְהִכָּ֣הוּ <S%H5221><s%> and slay נָ֑פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> him וְלוֹ֙ אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> was not מִשְׁפַּט־ <S%H4941><s%> whereas he [was] not worthy מָ֔וֶת <S%H4194><s%> of death כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> since לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> had not שֹׂנֵ֥א <S%H8130><s%> he hated ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> he ל֖וֹ מִתְּמ֥וֹל <S%H8543><s%> him not in time שִׁלְשֽׁוֹם׃ <S%H8032><s%> past

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> after that אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> Wherefore I command לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> thee saying שָׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three עָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> cities תַּבְדִּ֥יל <S%H914><s%> Thou shalt separate לָֽךְ׃ ס

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יַרְחִ֞יב <S%H7337><s%> enlarge יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> And if the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּבֻ֣לְךָ֔ <S%H1366><s%> thy coast כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֖ע <S%H7650><s%> as he hath sworn לַאֲבֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> unto thy fathers וְנָ֤תַן <S%H5414><s%> and give לְךָ֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee all the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> which he promised לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> to give לַאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> unto thy fathers

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if תִשְׁמֹר֩ <S%H8104><s%> If thou shalt keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמִּצְוָ֨ה <S%H4687><s%> all these commandments הַזֹּ֜את <S%H2063><s%> you לַעֲשֹׂתָ֗הּ <S%H6213><s%> to do אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֮ <S%H6680><s%> them which I command הַיּוֹם֒ <S%H3117><s%> thee this day לְאַהֲבָ֞ה <S%H157><s%> to love אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְלָלֶ֥כֶת <S%H1980><s%> walk בִּדְרָכָ֖יו <S%H1870><s%> in his ways כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיָּמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> ever וְיָסַפְתָּ֨ <S%H3254><s%> then shalt thou add לְךָ֥ עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> more שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three עָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> cities עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> besides הַשָּׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> more for thee beside these three הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יִשָּׁפֵךְ֙ <S%H8210><s%> be not shed דָּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> blood נָקִ֔י <S%H5355><s%> That innocent בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> in אַרְצְךָ֔ <S%H776><s%> thy land אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לְךָ֖ נַחֲלָ֑ה <S%H5159><s%> thee [for] an inheritance וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and דָּמִֽים׃ <S%H1818><s%> and [so] blood ס

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> is a אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> But if any man שֹׂנֵ֣א <S%H8130><s%> hate לְרֵעֵ֔הוּ <S%H7453><s%> his neighbour וְאָ֤רַב <S%H693><s%> and lie in wait לוֹ֙ וְקָ֣ם <S%H6965><s%> for him and rise up עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> against וְהִכָּ֥הוּ <S%H5221><s%> against him and smite נֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> him mortally וָמֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> that he die וְנָ֕ס <S%H5127><s%> and fleeth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> into one הֶעָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> cities הָאֵֽל׃ <S%H411><s%> of these

וְשָֽׁלְחוּ֙ <S%H7971><s%> shall send זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> Then the elders עִיר֔וֹ <S%H5892><s%> of his city וְלָקְח֥וּ <S%H3947><s%> and fetch אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> מִשָּׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there וְנָתְנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> him thence and deliver אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> בְּיַ֛ד <S%H3027><s%> him into the hand גֹּאֵ֥ל <S%H1350><s%> of the avenger הַדָּ֖ם <S%H1818><s%> of blood וָמֵֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> that he may die

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תָח֥וֹס <S%H2347><s%> shall not pity עֵֽינְךָ֖ <S%H5869><s%> Thine eye עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> and וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֧ <S%H1197><s%> him but thou shalt put away דַֽם־ <S%H1818><s%> blood הַנָּקִ֛י <S%H5355><s%> [the guilt of] innocent מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> from Israel וְט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good לָֽךְ׃ ס

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not תַסִּיג֙ <S%H5253><s%> Thou shalt not remove גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> landmark רֵֽעֲךָ֔ <S%H7453><s%> thy neighbour's אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which גָּבְל֖וּ <S%H1379><s%> have set רִאשֹׁנִ֑ים <S%H7223><s%> which they of old time בְּנַחֲלָֽתְךָ֙ <S%H5159><s%> in thine inheritance אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּנְחַ֔ל <S%H5157><s%> which thou shalt inherit בָּאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לְךָ֖ לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> thee to possess ס

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יָקוּם֩ <S%H6965><s%> shall not rise up עֵ֨ד <S%H5707><s%> witness אֶחָ֜ד <S%H259><s%> One בְּאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> against a man לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of any עָוֹן֙ <S%H5771><s%> for any iniquity וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any חַטָּ֔את <S%H2403><s%> or for any sin בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any חֵ֖טְא <S%H2399><s%> in any sin אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יֶֽחֱטָ֑א <S%H2398><s%> that he sinneth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פִּ֣י ׀ <S%H6310><s%> at the mouth שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> of two עֵדִ֗ים <S%H5707><s%> witnesses א֛וֹ <S%H176><s%> or עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> or at the mouth שְׁלֹשָֽׁה־ <S%H7969><s%> of three עֵדִ֖ים <S%H5707><s%> witnesses יָק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> be established דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> shall the matter

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יָק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> rise up עֵד־ <S%H5707><s%> witness חָמָ֖ס <S%H2555><s%> If a false בְּאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> against any man לַעֲנ֥וֹת <S%H6030><s%> to testify בּ֖וֹ סָרָֽה׃ <S%H5627><s%> against him [that which is] wrong

וְעָמְד֧וּ <S%H5975><s%> [is] shall stand שְׁנֵֽי־ <S%H8147><s%> Then both הָאֲנָשִׁ֛ים <S%H376><s%> the men אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who לָהֶ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> those הָרִ֖יב <S%H7379><s%> between whom the controversy לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> before הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> the priests וְהַשֹּׁ֣פְטִ֔ים <S%H8199><s%> and the judges אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יִהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בַּיָּמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> which shall be in those days הָהֵֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> those

וְדָרְשׁ֥וּ <S%H1875><s%> inquisition הַשֹּׁפְטִ֖ים <S%H8199><s%> And the judges הֵיטֵ֑ב <S%H3190><s%> shall make diligent וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> and if עֵֽד־ <S%H5707><s%> and behold [if] the witness שֶׁ֙קֶר֙ <S%H8267><s%> [be] a false הָעֵ֔ד <S%H5707><s%> witness שֶׁ֖קֶר <S%H8267><s%> falsely עָנָ֥ה <S%H6030><s%> [and] hath testified בְאָחִֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> against his brother

וַעֲשִׂ֣יתֶם <S%H6213><s%> Then shall ye do ל֔וֹ כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he זָמַ֖ם <S%H2161><s%> unto him as he had thought לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to have done לְאָחִ֑יו <S%H251><s%> unto his brother וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֥ <S%H1197><s%> away הָרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> the evil מִקִּרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H7130><s%> from among

וְהַנִּשְׁאָרִ֖ים <S%H7604><s%> And those which remain יִשְׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> shall hear וְיִרָ֑אוּ <S%H3372><s%> and fear וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and will never יֹסִ֨פוּ <S%H3254><s%> and shall henceforth לַעֲשׂ֜וֹת <S%H6213><s%> commit ע֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again כַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> no more any הָרָ֛ע <S%H7451><s%> such evil הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> such בְּקִרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H7130><s%> among

וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תָח֖וֹס <S%H2347><s%> shall not pity עֵינֶ֑ךָ <S%H5869><s%> And thine eye נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> [but] life בְּנֶ֗פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> [shall go] for life עַ֤יִן <S%H5869><s%> eye בְּעַ֙יִן֙ <S%H5869><s%> for eye שֵׁ֣ן <S%H8127><s%> tooth בְּשֵׁ֔ן <S%H8127><s%> for tooth יָ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> hand בְּיָ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> for hand רֶ֥גֶל <S%H7272><s%> foot בְּרָֽגֶל׃ <S%H7272><s%> for foot ס
